snippet: Bradley Wiggins, the winner of the Tour de France, powered his Sky team to victory in the second stage, the team time trial, at the Giro d’Italia.
abstract: Cyclist Bradley Wiggins leads his Sky team to victory in second stage of the Giro d'Italia.
lead_paragraph: Bradley Wiggins, the winner of the Tour de France, powered his Sky team to victory in the second stage, the team time trial, at the Giro d’Italia.

headline.seo: Bradley Wiggins and Sky Team on Top in Giro d’Italia
headline.main: Wiggins and Sky Team on Top in Giro d’Italia
headline.print_headline: Wiggins’s Team on Top in Giro
